#### Hours

**Hill-Stead Museum:**   
Open Wednesday through Sunday, 10:00am-4:00pm.

_Please note during field trip season (April-June, Sept-Oct) the tour schedule will fluctuate.  
Call ahead if you have questions or purchase tickets [online](https://hillstead.ticketing.veevartapp.com/tickets/view/list/general-admission-tours-2026)._

**The Pope Riddle House:  
**[**Permanent Collection**](https://hillstead.org/collections/)  
Available via Guided Tours only. 

  * The first tour starts at 10am and the last tour starts at 3:00pm.
  * Tours are capped at 12 people and are available on a first-come, first-serve basis. 
  * Your ticket is only valid for the time you selected and is not transferrable to another time slot. No entry will be permitted up to 10 minutes past the start time. Refunds are only provided in the event of museum closure.
  * No food, drinks, photography, or bags are permitted in the Pope Riddle House. Lockers are available for personal belongings.
  * Please present your email confirmation at the Museum Shop for entry.

accessibility_text:
### Plan Your Visit to Hill-Stead

#### Hours

**Hill-Stead Museum:**   
Open Wednesday through Sunday, 10:00am-4:00pm.

_Please note during field trip season (April-June, Sept-Oct) the tour schedule will fluctuate. Call ahead if you have questions._

**The Pope Riddle House:  
**[**Permanent Collection**](https://hillstead.org/collections/)  
Available via hourly Guided Tours only.   
The last tour starts at 3:00pm.   
Tours are capped at 12 people and are available on a first-come, first-serve basis.   
No food, drinks, photography, or bags are permitted in the Pope Riddle House. Lockers are available for personal belongings.

**Carriage Barn Visitor Center:**  
[**Temporary Exhibitions**](https://hillstead.org/exhibitions/)  
Available via self-guided visits.

**Tickets to the Pope Riddle House and Temporary Exhibitions can be purchased at the Museum Shop.**

**Hill-Stead Grounds:**   
Monday through Sunday, 7:30am-5:30pm.  
Organized groups and gatherings making use of the grounds require advance reservation via [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#6b02050d042b03020707181f0e0a0f4504190c).  
Dogs are welcome at Hill-Stead, but must wear a leash at all times. The museum asks that owners clean up after their pets; there are receptacles provided throughout the property.

**Please note that Hill-Stead is closed for all major holidays.**

collections_text:
Welcome to Hill-Stead. An American Story. Transport yourself from the everyday into a Colonial Revival estate housing Impressionist masterpieces. What will you experience at Hill-Stead today? Visit Today 

### A Wonder That is Hiding… 

An incredible example of a multi-generational American Story. A family whose generosity of spirit and commitment to art, nature and beauty were incredible and continued to this day. Step into Hill-Stead and experience a connection unlike any other.

## What's Happening Now...

**Advanced purchase tickets are available on our Visit page. This will reflect the most up-to-date schedule.**

Explore upcoming events, exhibitions, and programs. From guided tours to special events, there’s always something new to discover at Hill-Stead. What will you discover today?
